interface_iarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_INTERFACE_IARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_INTERFACE_IARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // interface_iarchive.hpp
00011

00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016

00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00020 #include <boost/cstdint.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_archive.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/archive/detail/iserializer.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/singleton.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00026 
00027 namespace boost {
00028 namespace archive {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00031 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_pointer_iserializer;
00032 
00033 template<class Archive>
00034 class interface_iarchive 
00035 {
00036 protected:
00037     interface_iarchive(){};
00038 public:
00040     // archive public interface
00041     typedef mpl::bool_<true> is_loading;
00042     typedef mpl::bool_<false> is_saving;
00043 
00044     // return a pointer to the most derived class
00045     Archive * This(){
00046         return static_cast<Archive *>(this);
00047     }
00048 
00049     template<class T>
00050     const basic_pointer_iserializer * 
00051     register_type(T * = NULL){
00052         const basic_pointer_iserializer & bpis =
00053             boost::serialization::singleton<
00054                 pointer_iserializer<Archive, T> 
00055             >::get_const_instance();
00056         this->This()->register_basic_serializer(bpis.get_basic_serializer());
00057         return & bpis;
00058     }
00059     template<class T>
00060     Archive & operator>>(T & t){
00061         this->This()->load_override(t, 0);
00062         return * this->This();
00063     }
00064 
00065     // the & operator 
00066     template<class T>
00067     Archive & operator&(T & t){
00068         return *(this->This()) >> t;
00069     }
00070 };
00071 
00072 } // namespace detail
00073 } // namespace archive
00074 } // namespace boost
00075 
00076 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00077 
00078 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_INTERFACE_IARCHIVE_HPP
